name: Power ABM
author: Omer Toledano

sections.description:
This plugin was designed to be used by the non-technical marketing user which is intending to do ABM marketing (Account Based Marketing).

Want to create personalized URLs (PURLs)? You’ve come to the right place. Power ABM will let you configure a personalized URL for
your marketing campaign easily and quickly (doesn’t require any technical knowledge).
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Power ABM screen to configure the plugin
sections.changelog:
0.0.4

Added URL preview near the save page

0.0.3

Changed descriptions to be clearer, added screenshots.

0.0.2

Added a few error checking (is .htaccess writable, did saving setting succeeded)

0.1

First release. Allows redirect functionality for one campaign.
